text: The 1999 Campeonato Ecuatoriano de Fútbol de la Serie A was the 41st season of the Serie A, the top level of professional football in Ecuador. LDU Quito successfully defended their title and won their sixth national championship. ==First stage== ==Second stage== ==Relegation Liguilla== ==Liguilla Final== ==Championship finals== \---- ==External links== *Official website *1999 season on RSSSF 1999 Ecu Football
title: 1999 Campeonato Ecuatoriano de Fútbol Serie A
